OOC: Nobody knows the names of his personalities. He is just Chimera 
to the outside world.

Bic:

Chimera began to feel impatient.

Chimera: With the predacons of course! How many times will I have to 
repeat it? My best weapon is the words I wield. I manipulate my 
enemies into doing what I make them think is best for them. Simple. 
Even a dinobot would get this!
